title: Vautage Retail Power Research
background: There has been a debate concerning the cost of a natural 'Big F' production due to an increase in grass cost per case from $3.95 to $3.85 within the last two years. Event in 1983 caused a custom in 1983. These two elements combined result in an increase in the cost of a natural Big F from an average of $4.19.

alternatives.name: Bi6lF w/12 packs
alternatives.description: Two trial size packs of 12 will be sold at 60% price on 20 pack.

alternatives.name: Salebk Sample 12
alternatives.description: One 'trial size' pack of 12 will be sold at 50% the price of a 20 pack.

alternatives.name: Great Rebate
alternatives.description: Two 20's packs are sold at full price attached with a bounce back offer either a cash fund or three free drinks.

research.description: The proposed research will test each of these propositions in market along with a standard Big F as control to measure some potential relative effectiveness of each proposition in terms of competitive concern. Efficiency ratio will thus be calculated by dividing total cost converted to relative figure.
